snippet: A new bill would end capital punishment for drug smugglers, who accounted for most of the country’s hundreds of executions last year, but hard-liners oppose it....
abstract: Iranian Parliament is considering bill to abolish death penalty for drug smugglers, who make up majority of those executed; bill is likely to face strong opposition from hard-liners in country that has highest execution rate of any country but China,
lead_paragraph: A new bill would end capital punishment for drug smugglers, who accounted for most of the country’s hundreds of executions last year, but hard-liners oppose it.

headline.main: Iran, Which Executed Nearly 1,000 Last Year, Considers Cutting Back
headline.print_headline: Iran Executes Thousands, but Some Seek to Cut Pace
